title: Test
summary: This grouped bar chart has 4 categories of Race on the x axis representing 2 groups: Obama, and Romney.
Averaging these 2 groups, the highest category is found for Race White (non-Hispanic) with a mean value of 48.0.
Followed by Black with a mean value of 47.5.
The lowest category is observed at Nonwhite that has a mean value of 47.0
showing a difference of 2.1% with the maximum value.
In case of Black, Obama shows more dominance than any other Race with a value 90.0 and it has the lowest value 37.0 in White (non-Hispanic).
